description.en:
**Table Of Contents:**

​1. Nude Mao / Hadaka no Mao / [裸のマオ](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/10834108156723939020)
2. The Kishimu Family / Kishimu-ke / [きしむ家](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/13933686331646161135)
3. Hot Skin / Atsui Hifu / [あつい皮膚](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/3269632237306408086)
4. My Fave's Skin Became Rough Chapter 1 / Oshi no Hada ga Areta Daiichiwa / [推しが引退した 第1話](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/3270296674358114216)
5. My Fave's Skin Became Rough Chapter 2 / Oshi no Hada ga Areta Dainiwa / [推しが引退した 第2話](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/3270296674358114220)
6. My Fave's Skin Became Rough Chapter 3 / Oshi no Hada ga Areta Daisanwa / [推しが引退した 第3話](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/3270296674358114224)
6.5. Hot Skin Bonus “Waiting Room” / Atsui Hifu Omake “Waiting Room” / あつい皮膚おまけ「ウェイティングルーム」 **(Digital Only)**
6.6. My Fave's Skin Became Rough Bonus “I Started Social Media” / Oshi no Hada ga Areta Omake “SNS Hajimeta” / 推しが引退したおまけ「SNS始めた」 **(Digital Only)**

**Note: Bonus Chapters 6.5 and 6.6 are special benefits exclusive to the digital version.**
